animeTitle: Qin Shi Ming Yue: Bai Bu Fei Jian
animeDescription: Set during the Qin Dynasty in ancient China, a brave assassin attempts to kill the Emperor to save his homeland. However, the assassin fails and in retaliation, the Emperor sends his troops to kill his eight year old son. A highly skilled swordsman intervenes and rescues the boy. After their escape from the forces of the Emperor, they embark on a journey to change the destiny of the empire while encountering several friends and foes along the way.
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Qin Shi Ming Yue: Ye Jin Tianming', 'Prequel: Qin Shi Ming Yue 3D: Dianying Longteng Wanli', 'Spin-off: Qin Shi Ming Yue: Kong Shan Niao Yu']
animeCharacters: ['Jing, Tianming', 'Ge, Nie', 'Wei, Zhuang', 'Duanmu, Rong', 'Baifeng ', 'Ying, Zheng', 'Chilian', 'Li, Si', 'Gao, Yue', 'Xiang, ShaoYu']
